pydexpi.dexpi_classes.plantStructure.enterprise module

This module contains a pydantic class for the DEXPI Enterprise class

class pydexpi.dexpi_classes.plantStructure.enterprise.Enterprise(*, id: str = None, customAttributes: list[CustomAttribute] = [], enterpriseIdentificationCode: str | None = None, enterpriseName: str | None = None)

Bases: IndustrialComplexParentStructure, PlantSectionParentStructure, PlantStructureItem, ProcessPlantParentStructure, TechnicalItemParentStructure

An enterprise as defined by ISA 95.

enterpriseName: str | None

Configuration for the model, should be a dictionary conforming to [ConfigDict][pydantic.config.ConfigDict].

model_fields: ClassVar[dict[str, FieldInfo]] = {'customAttributes': FieldInfo(annotation=list[CustomAttribute], required=False, default=[]), 'enterpriseIdentificationCode': FieldInfo(annotation=Union[str, NoneType], required=False), 'enterpriseName': FieldInfo(annotation=Union[str, NoneType], required=False), 'id': FieldInfo(annotation=str, required=False, default_factory=<lambda>)}
